{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Diona
|date               = 2023-01-18
|zh                 = 
;今天是迪奥娜的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''吃我一记普通攻击&mdash;&mdash;
:'''迪奥娜：'''……
:'''派蒙：'''嘿嘿，我的卡牌充能也满了，看来胜负已定了呢~
:'''迪奥娜：'''哼，不一定哦。
:'''派蒙：'''看我的，元素爆…
:'''派蒙：'''等等，骰子不够了？！
:'''迪奥娜：'''结束了吗？那接下来就是我的回合了。
:'''派蒙：'''欸？
:'''派蒙：'''等等，什么时候多了这么多召唤物…
:'''迪奥娜：'''最后一击！
:'''派蒙：'''呜哇，我的牌，我的牌都被击败了！
:'''迪奥娜：'''哼哼~胜负已定。这就是「贪杯」的下场。
:'''派蒙：'''明明就剩最后两点，为什么，为什么…
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙，不擅长算术呢。
|dialogue_review_zh = 哼哼~胜负已定。这就是「贪杯」的下场。
|en                 =
;Today is [[Diona]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' Take this Normal Attack!
:'''Diona:''' ...
:'''Paimon:''' Hehe, my Energy is full too. Looks like we have a winner~
:'''Diona:''' Hmph, maybe not.
:'''Paimon:''' Take this Elemental Bur&mdash;
:'''Paimon:''' Wait, Paimon's out of dice!?
:'''Diona:''' Are you done? It's my turn then.
:'''Paimon:''' Huh?
:'''Paimon:''' Wait, since when were there so many summons...
:'''Diona:''' Final attack!
:'''Paimon:''' Aaah, my cards... my cards are all defeated!
:'''Diona:''' Hmph~ The game is set. Couldn't handle your "drink"?<ref group=Note>This line is a reference to Diona's [[Diona/Voice-Overs/Chinese#Elemental Burst|Elemental Burst: II]] line, {{Lang|{{zh|贪杯的下场…哼！|lit=The aftermath of over-drinking... Hmph!}}|en=Can't handle your drink? Hmph!}}.</ref>
:'''Paimon:''' There was clearly only two Health left... Why... why...?
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon, you aren't so good at counting, are you?
|dialogue_review_en = Hmph~ The game is set. Couldn't handle your "drink"?
}}
